title: Jenna Dewan shows off her growing baby bump in bohemian maxi dress as she runs errands before lunch
text:
She announced her pregnancy only two weeks ago.

And Jenna Dewan put her growing baby bump out there for the world to see on Tuesday in a flowing floral-patterned maxi dress as she ran errands and visited a café.

The Step Up star, 38, paired the dress with a set of layered gold necklaces with pendants.

Boho: Jenna Dewan put her growing baby bump out there for the world to see on Tuesday in a flowing floral-patterned maxi dress as she ran errands and visited a café

Jenna also accessorized with some black cat-eye sunglasses with a geometric shape.

Her feet hit the pavement in camel-colored flat sandals that revealed a grey-toned pedicure on her feet.

She also carried a rust-colored crossbody satchel over her right shoulder.

On-the-go: The Step Up star, 38, paired the dress with a set of layered gold necklaces with pendants

Dewan and boyfriend Steve Kazee confirmed they're expecting to People on Sept. 24.

'We are beyond overjoyed and couldn’t be happier to be expanding our family!' the two said in a statement.

The two have been dating at least since October 2018, as a source confirmed to People.

Love: Dewan and boyfriend Steve Kazee confirmed they're expecting to People on Sept. 24

Dewan took to Instagram in June to make their relationship official and posted a photo of themselves mid-embrace.

'Speaking of peace... [heart emoji],' the actress-dancer captioned the shot.

This will be Kazee's first child and Dewan's second, as she shares six-year-old daughter Everly with ex Channing Tatum.
